entry.title: Flood Watch issued May 21 at 10:55AM PDT until May 21 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Warm temperatures continue to result in efficient snowmelt in the Sierra. As a result, flows on creeks, streams, and rivers that drain high elevations will continue to flow quick and very cold with flooding on some mainstem rivers. Scattered showers and thunderstorms are expected Sunday afternoon which may cause additional flooding concerns.
